description:
Satoko flees in terror and has an accident. Injured, she witnesses the Great Hinamizawa Disaster, which sends her into shock.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Awakening Misfortune Chapter Part 4: The Great Hinamizawa Disaster
Erwachendes Unglück Kapitel 4 - Das große Hinamizawa Desaster
Yakusamashi Hen Sono Yon: Hinamizawa Daisaigai
厄醒し編 其の四 雛見沢大災害
